title: The global First World War
itunes:title: The global First World War
itunes:subtitle: Historian and broadcaster David Olusoga discusses the subject of his new TV series The World's War, revealing how millions of people across the globe arrived in Europe to fight the First World War.  See acast.com/privacy for privacy a...
description:
Historian and broadcaster David Olusoga discusses the subject of his new TV series The World's War, revealing how millions of people across the globe arrived in Europe to fight the First World War.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
itunes:summary:
Historian and broadcaster David Olusoga discusses the subject of his new TV series The World's War, revealing how millions of people across the globe arrived in Europe to fight the First World War.
